column2: It has been said that mere ease after torment is delight for a time; and the countenances of these poor creatures expressed it now. Forty-nine operations were successfully performed.

column2: Four had died; three recovered without an operation.

column2: Gabriel, will you stay on with me? she said, smiling winningly, and not troubling to bring her lips quite together again at the end, because there was going to be another smile soon.
